text: this is Kitty sand for the New York
Times they say that laughter is the best
medicine and nowadays thanks to great
apps like mouth off that means you can
get your daily dose from a smartphone in
your pocket mouth off which is free on
iOS and $1 on Android here's a classic
funny app you will probably use over and
over again
especially if you have children the
premise is simple the app animates a
cartoon mouth on your phone screen while
it listens to your voice spoken into the
phone's microphone which means if you
cover your mouth with your phone anyone
watching gets to see the chattering jaws
of a skeleton the wobbling lips of a
monster or any one of a number of other
merits this app isn't very sophisticated
I'll admit but if you and your friends
are in the right mood it can definitely
elicit a giggle or two or three in a
similar vein you should also try the app
with stache which is free on iOS and
Android to use this app to take a selfie
of your face using the Handy on-screen
guidelines to Center your features and
then the app tries to guess where your
mouth and eyes are and you can adjust
the detection points for more accuracy
then after a bit of automatic image
processing you'll see your face with a
beautiful flourishing moustache on your
upper lip you can choose between one of
a number of different moustache styles
and buy more via in-app purchases and
the results are really amusingly
convincing making the resulting pictures
perfect to share over social media or to
message to a friend
again this apps not complicated but it
is simple amusing fun for more classic
laugh inducing a checkout cheeseburger
this free Android and iOS app collects
together in one place
lots of different internet comedy memes
and yes of course this means it does
include amusing cats as well as viewing
classic comedy memes you can upload your
own earth√≠s to try and make other users
love the apps interface is sometimes a
little clunky and you may want to keep
an eye open for adult content that's
with many things online and that's it
from me I hope you start 2015 with a
great laugh
Oh
